name: The Knight of Jump and Run
name_original: The Knight of Jump and Run
description:
Welcome to my very first game!

This game is a very short Jump and Run game, where you must complete 3 tiny levels to win.

If you have like 5 minutes, just download the game and play it for free.

Its only 20 MB and you can download and play it in 20 seconds.

If you had the time to play the game, please leave a comment to the game and tell me if you like/dislike it and why.

I designed almost everything in this game and it nearly cost me 1 year to learn how to make all these mechanics and designs.

I really hope you like it and I would appreciate every download and every feedback so be free to comment ! <3
